text:
I am asking to discuss this with you. Will you please do that. I understand your perspective. I take it very seriously. That is why I went to great last
night to explain. May we please discuss rather than you going dark on what you and Dr Brown are doing?
Message 1307 of 4024
Can you please respond?
Sent:02/10/2024 at 04:56 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/10/2024 at 05:02 PM)
Subject:Re: Dr Brown
Message 1308 of 4024
Dr. Brown did not know the issue going into this.
After Adrian shared with her, she asked me if I knew surveillance fell under this category to make sure I was aware. It is alarming and requires the
appropriate safeguards. I said I did.
Sent:02/10/2024 at 04:57 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/10/2024 at 04:57 PM)
Subject:Re: Dr Brown
Message 1309 of 4024
How did she not know? It was in the very first email from you.
And you two did meet, despite her saying otherwise. So she is a liar?
I am not trying to fight. I just want to find out what is really going on.
Can we please discuss since there is clearly something going on?
Sent:02/10/2024 at 05:00 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/10/2024 at 05:02 PM)
Subject:Re: Dr Brown
Message 1310 of 4024
I’m not doing anything with Dr. Brown.
Similar to Yurishka, these individuals have a professional obligation to call out when they see harm or DV. They are obligated to Robert.
Perhaps take a step back a think why all these people are ringing the alarm bell. Is it the entire world or is it you?
Is everyone else just crazy?
This was Adrian’s story.
Sent:02/10/2024 at 05:02 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/10/2024 at 05:05 PM)
Subject:Re: Password
